Hours: Mon-Fri 8:00AM – 5:00 PM.
Closed for lunch 11:00AM – 12:00 PM.

WELCOME TOCity of Reno, Texas

The City of Reno, Texas website is provided to make information easily accessible to our citizens and the general public. The Mayor, City Council, and City Employees want to allow the residents of our city to easily stay informed.
